channel.title: CTO, Data Science, DevOps, Product Development

item.title: Des Holmes
item.description: Introduction My name is Des Holmes, I’m a CTO with 20 years of experience. I help companies grow by hiring teams, defining digital strategies, rolling out development and delivery pipelines, and building products and services. During my career I’ve had the pleasure of working with the following brands: Goldman Sachs, Commerzbank, KPMG, BBC, HSBC, JP Morgan, Deutsche Bank, Ernst & Young, Akzonobel, Sainsbury’s, Reckitt Benckiser, Heineken, Pernod Ricard, Diageo, Adidas, Nike, VWG, Hentsu.
